## Internship/training program

Gain valuable industry/academic experience in computational biology, machine learning, R/Python programming, bioinformatics and data science with our internship program!

We're a leading researchers in the field of computational biology and we're offering a unique internship opportunity for individuals interested in these fields. As an intern, you'll have the chance to work alongside our team of experts and contribute to cutting-edge research projects.

During the internship, you'll:

1. Learn about the latest computational biology, machine learning, R/Python programming, machine learning and bioinformatics techniques and computatationl tools
2. Work on real-world projects and contribute to ongoing research
3. Receive mentoring and guidance from industry experts
4. Receive a stipend for the duration of the internship (Depend on availability)

We're looking for individuals with a strong background in computational, mathematics, statistics, engineering and biological sciences or a related field and an interest in computational methods. No prior experience with R or bioinformatics is required.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to gain valuable industry experience and kickstart your career in computational biology. Apply now and take the first step towards your dream career!"
